text: Ojo gumon dored (ej joroni Muhammad (alajhissalotu vassalom), ki ʙa ʙihist xohed raft, hol on ki imtihon karda nasudaed ʙa vazninihoi cang va ʙa ʙihist doxil naxohed sud to on dame, ki imtihon karda saved va Alloh ma'lum mekunad az mijoni sumo ci kasone dar rohi U cihod mekunand va ci kasone dar muqoʙili dusman saʙr mekunand
